text: Colin Kelly Jost (born June 29, 1982) is an American comedian and screenwriter. He is the head writer for the television program Saturday Night Live. In 2014, Jost became a cast member and became the co-anchor of Weekend Update alongside Michael Che. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:American television writers Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Entertainers from Staten Island Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Screenwriters from New York City
title: Colin Jost
